name: contentful-sdk-core
description: Core modules for the Contentful JS SDKs
author: Contentful <opensource@contentful.com>

scripts.clean: rimraf *.js && rimraf coverage && rimraf src/vendor-* && rimraf vendor-* && rimraf src/package.json
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run vendor && cp -r src/vendor-* . && cp -r src/jsdoc* . && npm run build:dist
scripts.vendor: npm run vendor:node && npm run vendor:browser && npm run vendor:axiospackage
scripts.vendor:node: rimraf src/vendor-node && mkdirp src/vendor-node && babel node_modules/axios/lib/ --out-dir src/vendor-node/
scripts.vendor:browser: rimraf src/vendor-browser && mkdirp src/vendor-browser && babel node_modules/axios/dist/axios.js --out-file src/vendor-browser/axios.js
scripts.prepublish: in-publish && npm run build || not-in-publish && npm run vendor
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
